snippet.title: Ripples~ a visual novel game by sakevisual
snippet.description:
"One person's life is just a drop in a bucket."
 
"I just don't like people who think they can change the world."

"You want to believe it, but you're afraid to. You're afraid that you can't make a difference so you don't try."

One of those visual novel games that opens your eyes and makes you see the world in a different perspective. :) I decided to record the game since it only took 10 minutes to finish. :) An awesome watch. Perfect for all the pessimists and optimists out there. :)

you can get the game here:

http://www.sakevisual.com/

:)
